website_summaries.verdict: A custom towing mirror that lets you quickly change the mirror's face position any time you choose.
pros: Offers a user-friendly power mirror adjustment
Comes with heated mirror glass that clears frost and ice and reduces fogging
Boasts an amber LED turn signal light under the mirror face with a clear lens that is built into the outside corner
Includes a puddle lamp that illuminates the area under the mirror

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: My F150's original driver side mirror was stolen. I was looking online to find something to replace it, was not sure about the quality of the mirror, so I ordered it and after receiving the mirror I checked the glasses, it was great and nice looking! very easy to install and was perfectly fitted in a place like the OEM!

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly on m 2012 Ford F150 XLT Super Crew. Had an extra light on the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly on m 2012 Ford F150 XLT Super Crew. Had an extra light on the bottom that my original didn't have, but I like it because it lights up underneath the mirror when I unlock the truck with my remote, great at night. Easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2010 F-150 XLT with no problems. Save yourself some money.
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want to pay for the Ford OEM part, then this is a good way to go. The fit and finish might not be quite as good but it is close. Works just like you would expect. I also gained a puddle light not installed on the original. The original Ford part number is 9L34-17682-CG5YGY. If you check the Ford web site (parts.ford.com) it goes for $219. So this is a substantial savings. Installation is not too bad. There are many YouTube videos showing how to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive but hundreds less than the ford dealer. Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: YouTube videos showing the easy way to access past the door panel were key. Only took about 30 minutes. The first replacement mirror I bought wasn’t motorized so it was good to get this one which works great.
